cont.entity_a: The keyboard is durable and easy to type. Works perfectly with Windows 7 Media Center. The keyboard works with Xbox 360. The keyboard drops keystrokes if typed quickly.
cont.entity_b: The keyboard works perfectly with Dell Axim X5. Software installed fine but the keyboard never worked properly.

cont.entity_a: The mouse is extremely stiff, finicky, and poorly designed. Mouse pointer is difficult to use, needing specific pressure. The mouse is pressure-sensitive and difficult to use. Mouse functions are unreliable and not user-friendly.
Requires an IR receiver which is not included. IR allows programming for TV functions. IR works at all angles with excellent distance. Requires a line of sight due to IR.
cont.entity_b: Difficult alignment with PDA IR port.

cont.entity_a: The multimedia keys are back-lit, but not the whole keyboard. Backlit media keys, but not the entire keyboard.

cont.entity_b: Does not work with Tungsten E. Not supported for Tungstens, causing hard reset.

cont.entity_a: Setup is easy with no software needed.
Design is aesthetically pleasing and ergonomic.
Good value for money if you have the right setup.

cont.entity_b: Battery life is shortened on a Zodiac.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable with good functionality for media control.
cont.entity_b: Must be used on a flat solid surface.
The stand is cheap and fragile.

cont.entity_a: The track-stick is difficult to use.
